name: Dore
long_bio: Dore is a skilled English-speaking guide known for leading immersive wildlife and adventure tours across Madagascar. With deep knowledge of the island’s rainforests and rare species, he offers unforgettable nature-filled experiences.

name: Aina
long_bio: Aina specializes in hiking tours through Madagascar’s scenic trails. Energetic and knowledgeable, he leads off-the-beaten-path adventures that reveal the island’s hidden beauty and charm.

name: Feno
long_bio: Feno is a passionate birdwatching expert with an eye for Madagascar’s rare species. His tours offer rich insights into local avifauna, making each outing a delight for nature lovers.

name: Sunny
long_bio: Sunny blends Madagascar’s wildlife and culture into each tour. Her warm approach and deep knowledge create engaging journeys through both nature and tradition.
